1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content type for nested relations.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Rel.Mono
6  ( Mono (..), RelMono, RelText,
7    isMonoTerm, isMonoNest,
8    gMonoTerm, gMonoNest,
9    pMonoTerm, pMonoNest,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base               as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Rel.Rel       as T
14
15-- | Content type for monotype relation.
16data Mono c
17    = MonoTerm c                 -- ^ Terminal content
18    | MonoNest (RelMono c)       -- ^ Nested relation
19      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
20
21-- | Monotype relation.
22type RelMono c = T.Rel (Mono c)
23
24-- | Text relation.
25type RelText = RelMono String
26
27-- | Test terminal content.
28isMonoTerm :: Mono c -> Bool
29isMonoTerm (MonoTerm _) = True
30isMonoTerm (MonoNest _) = False
31
32-- | Test nested relation.
33isMonoNest :: Mono c -> Bool
34isMonoNest (MonoTerm _) = False
35isMonoNest (MonoNest _) = True
36
37-- | Get terminal content.
38gMonoTerm :: Mono c -> c
39gMonoTerm (MonoTerm c) = c
40gMonoTerm (MonoNest _) = B.bug "gMonoTerm"
41
42-- | Get nested relation.
43gMonoNest :: Mono c -> RelMono c
44gMonoNest (MonoNest r) = r
45gMonoNest (MonoTerm _) = B.bug "gMonoNest"
46
47-- | Put terminal content.
48pMonoTerm :: c -> Mono c
49pMonoTerm = MonoTerm
50
51-- | Put nested relation.
52pMonoNest :: RelMono c -> Mono c
53pMonoNest = MonoNest
54
